definition: Tianwan in Lianyungang 連雲港|连云港, site of large nuclear power plant

sentences.english: Unaccebtable defects was found during the welding of surge pipeline of TNPS.
sentences.chinese: 田灣核電站波動管的焊接過程中出現了超標缺陷。

sentences.english: Tianwan Nuclear Power Plant is the first time for China to bring in nuclear power units Russia.
sentences.chinese: 田灣核電站是中國首次自俄引進核電機組。
